Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom Leppert , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom Leppert , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval. Given these circumstances I have requested the City Manager propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. So what was Dallas Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway thinking when he gave Michael Vick the key to the city?
